brief: Blends two color values together based on the blending mode given as the MODE parameter
name: blendColor()
description: Blends two color values together based on the blending mode given as the MODE parameter. The possible modes are described in the reference for the blend() function.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: either BLEND, ADD, SUBTRACT, DARKEST, LIGHTEST, DIFFERENCE, EXCLUSION, MULTIPLY, SCREEN, OVERLAY, HARD_LIGHT, SOFT_LIGHT, DODGE, or BURN
